item.title: Theme Documentation - Built-in Shortcodes
item.author: morero
item.description: Hugo provides multiple built-in shortcodes for author convenience and to keep your markdown content clean.

item.title: Theme Documentation - Extended Shortcodes
item.author: morero
item.description: uBlogger theme provides multiple shortcodes on top of built-in ones in Hugo.

item.title: Theme Documentation - Basics
item.author: morero
item.description: Discover what the Hugo - uBlog theme is all about and the core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Theme Documentation - Content
item.author: morero
item.description: Find out how to create and organize your content quickly and intuitively in uBlogger theme.
